resources.string: Body Mass Index, or BMI, is a measure of body size. It combines a person\'s weight and height. BMI results can give you an idea of ​​whether a person has the correct weight for height..
This calculator is not intended for children, pregnant or lactating women. Or athletes like bodybuilders.
Your normal weight should be from
To reach the normal weight you must lose weight about
To reach the normal weight you must increase weight about
Your best ideal weight rate is
Underweight: Your weight is low and you need to regularly eat until you reach your ideal weight.
Normal: The result indicates that you get the ideal weight appropriate, so keep this weight and exercise.
Overweight: You are overweight, exercise until you get the perfect weight.
Obese: You suffer from obesity that may harm you; you should exercise with a commitment to a healthy diet
